subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Agrilus viridifrons Kerremans, 1893
. Described from 1 specimen ( holotype by monotypy). Type locality: “Belgaum”. Type specimens: Holotype ♂ ( BMNH ): “Type [p] [round label with red border] \ Belgaum Andrewes [h] \ viridifrons Kerr. Type [h] \ A. viridifrons Kerrem. Inde [h] \
Kerremans 1903
-59 [p]”.

Agrilus verecundus Kerremans, 1893
. Described from 1 specimen ( holotype by monotypy). Type locality: “Kanara”. Type specimens: Holotype ♀ (BMNH): “Type [p] [round label with red border] \ Kanara Andrewes [h] \ verecundus Kerr. Type [h] \ A. verecundus Kerrem. Inde [h] \
Kerremans 1903
-59 [p]”.

Examined specimens.
INDIA .
Karnataka .
Ammathi ; 12°14’30”N , 075°52’E ; 2-1952; alt.
945 m
; 10 ( EJCB )
.

Kerala. Thekkady Periyar Lake; 09°34’N , 077°10’E ; 4-1997; alt. 900-1000 m ; 1 ♂ ( EJCB ).
Tamil Nadu. Aureoville
,
10 km N Pondicherry
; 12°00’02”N , 079°48’32”E ; 2-2007; 1 ♀ ( MNCA ) ( Jendek & Nakládal 2019 )
\\ Nilgiri Hills ,
11 km SE Kotagiri
, Kunchappanai ; 11°24’N , 076°56’E ; 5-2002; alt.
1000-1200 m
; 2 ♂ , 2 ♀ ( EJCB )
\\ Nilgiri Hills ,
15 km SE Kotagiri
, Kunchappanai ; 11°24’N , 076°56’E ; 11-1993; alt.
900 m
; 25 ( EJCB )
\\ Nilgiri hills,
15km SE of Kotagiri
, Kunjappanai env.; 11°22’N , 076°56’E ; 6-1999; alt.
900 m
; 1 ♂ , 1 ♀ ( EJCB )
\\ Nilgiris ,
15 km SE Kotagiri
, Kunchappanai ; 11°22’N , 076°56’E ; 5-2000; alt.
900 m
; 280 ( EJCB )
.
SRI LANKA . Dambulla ; 07°51’N , 080°39’E ; 4, 5-1991; alt.
300 m
; 1 ♂ ( EJCB )
\\ Kandy ; 07°17’42”N , 080°37’47”E ; 7-1985; 1 ♀ ( EJCB )
.
Distribution. INDIA : Karnataka , Kerala , Tamil Nadu ; SRI LANKA .

Host plant. Larval:
Grewia tiliifolia Vahl
, Malvaceae (cited by Beeson 1941 ).

Remarks.
Agrilus viridifrons
occurs in South India and Sri Lanka . The reliable identification is based only on characters of aedeagus with membranous sensory zones subangulate apically (
Fig. 5I
).
